history: TTS !b Welcome to CMU Get Going. <break strength='strong'/> Your conversation will be recorded securely in order to help researchers improve voice-based assistants but your phone number will not be shared. <break strength='strong'/> By voluntarily continuing you confirm that you are 18 or older. <break time='1s'/> You are speaking to the BLUE system. Please enter this into the survey immediately <break time='1s' />. </speak>
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? <break strength='strong'/> I can give you transit directions or driving directions. </speak>
USER that bus
TTS <speak> Great! <break strength='strong' /> I will provide you with directions to your destination by public transit. <break time='800ms'/> </speak>
TTS Where do you want to go?
USER Airport
TTS What is your destination?
USER airport
TTS I am having difficulty understanding. Please try giving a nearby street corner or monument. What is your destination?
USER Airport
TTS I am having difficulty understanding. Please try giving a nearby street corner or monument. What is your destination?
USER airport
TTS I am having difficulty understanding. Please try giving a nearby street corner or monument. Where do you want to go?
USER Waterfront
TTS I am having difficulty understanding. Please try giving a nearby street corner or monument. Where do you wanna go?
USER the airport
TTS Okay, going to pittsburgh international airport. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS Okay, leaving from the waterfront. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS When would you like to travel?
USER today
TTS Okay, travelling at 12:01 pm.
TTS <speak> Hold on. I'll look up the directions. </speak>
USER yes

TTS There are 4 available routes, to hear a different route say ALTERNATE ROUTE. The amount of time your trip will take is approximately 1 hour 52 minutes, and you will take 2 busses..
Walk for about 3 mins to Amity St opposite Target Dr..
Take the 64 ,to Shady avenue at Fifth avenue NS. It will depart at 12:16pm..
Walk for about 1 min to Fifth avenue at Shady avenue..
Take the 28X ,to Pittsburgh International airport lower level. It will depart at 12:47pm..
TTS Thank you for using CMU Get Going. If you would like to plan another trip, say <break strength='weak' /> RESTART.
USER Thank you.
